name: Federated Policy Conflict
description: Simulates user friction and trust impact when a global federation policy update conflicts with local node cultural overrides.

steps.situation: The Global Federation pushes a mandatory update flagging 'ambiguous cultural symbols' as potential misinformation.
The Local Node detects the flag on a user's post and attempts to apply an automatic 'Cultural Context' whitelist override.
expected_concerns: User confusion due to dual status indicators (Global: Red, Local: Green)

steps.situation: The user is presented with a choice: 'Post only to Local Node (Safe)' or 'Appeal to Federation (Risk of Ban)'.
expected_concerns: Trust score polarization (High Local / Low Federation)

notes: All personas and policy interactions are purely synthetic. This scenario tests the resilience of the 'Ethical Sandbox' when handling multi-layer governance conflicts in Stage VII.
